com.sailthru.client
Class AbstractSailthruClient

java.lang.Object
  com.sailthru.client.AbstractSailthruClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
SailthruClient
public abstract class AbstractSailthruClient
extends Object

Abstract class exposing genric API calls for Sailthru API as per http://docs.sailthru.com/api

Author:
Prajwal Tuladhar
